text: Pole Poppenspäler is an East German film. It was released in 1954. It is based on the 1874 novel Pole Poppenspäler by 19th-century German author Theodor Storm. ==External links== * Category:1954 films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films based on German novels Category:Films based on works by Theodor Storm Category:Films set in the 19th century
title: Pole Poppenspäler (1954 film)
